description:
Mob is challenged to a one-on-one fight with Black Vinegar Middle School`s shadow leader, Hanazawa Teruki, otherwise known as Teru. Mob doesn`t use his powers but Teru goes all out on him, destroying everything around him. Teru continues to unleash his incredible power when Mob suddenly remembers a tragedy that happened between him and Ritsu...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Samouraï déserteur ~ Un Médium et moi ~
